languages.text: {n}Вы почти не сомневаетесь, что он ищет Соломона. При потере хозяина протоколы кибермастифа предписывают по возможности вернуться к своему арбитру.{/n}
{n}There is little doubt in your mind that he is looking for Solomorne. If a cyber-mastiff loses its master, its protocols dictate that it must return to its Arbitrator if possible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы почти не сомневаетесь, что он ищет Соломона. При потере хозяина протоколы кибермастифа предписывают по возможности вернуться к своему арбитру.{/n}

{n}There is little doubt in your mind that he is looking for Solomorne. If a cyber-mastiff loses its master, its protocols dictate that it must return to its Arbitrator if possible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼がソロモーンを探していることは間違いなかった。サイバーマスチフが主人を見失った場合、そのプロトコルに従い、可能であれば自分のアービトレイターの元へ戻ることになっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is little doubt in your mind that he is looking for Solomorne. If a cyber-mastiff loses its master, its protocols dictate that it must return to its Arbitrator if possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼がソロモーンを探していることは間違いなかった。サイバーマスチフが主人を見失った場合、そのプロトコルに従い、可能であれば自分のアービトレイターの元へ戻ることになっている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hast keinen Zweifel, dass er nach Solomorne sucht. Wenn ein Cyber-Mastiff seinen Herren verliert, schreibt sein Protokoll vor, dass er zu seinem Arbitrator zurückkehrt, falls möglich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is little doubt in your mind that he is looking for Solomorne. If a cyber-mastiff loses its master, its protocols dictate that it must return to its Arbitrator if possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hast keinen Zweifel, dass er nach Solomorne sucht. Wenn ein Cyber-Mastiff seinen Herren verliert, schreibt sein Protokoll vor, dass er zu seinem Arbitrator zurückkehrt, falls möglich.

languages.text: {n}De toute évidence, son objectif premier est de retrouver Solomorne. Quand un cyber-mastiff perd son maître, ses protocoles lui dictent de se lancer à sa recherche.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is little doubt in your mind that he is looking for Solomorne. If a cyber-mastiff loses its master, its protocols dictate that it must return to its Arbitrator if possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}De toute évidence, son objectif premier est de retrouver Solomorne. Quand un cyber-mastiff perd son maître, ses protocoles lui dictent de se lancer à sa recherche.{/n}

languages.text: {n}No te cabe ninguna duda de que está buscando a Solomorne. Si un cibermastín pierde a su amo, sus protocolos le conminan a hacer todo lo posible por regresar junto a su Arbitrator.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is little doubt in your mind that he is looking for Solomorne. If a cyber-mastiff loses its master, its protocols dictate that it must return to its Arbitrator if possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No te cabe ninguna duda de que está buscando a Solomorne. Si un cibermastín pierde a su amo, sus protocolos le conminan a hacer todo lo posible por regresar junto a su Arbitrator.{/n}

languages.text: {n}毫无疑问，它正在寻找索罗蒙。根据协议规定，当生化獒犬与法务官失散时，它必须想尽一切办法回到它的主人身边。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is little doubt in your mind that he is looking for Solomorne. If a cyber-mastiff loses its master, its protocols dictate that it must return to its Arbitrator if possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}毫无疑问，它正在寻找索罗蒙。根据协议规定，当生化獒犬与法务官失散时，它必须想尽一切办法回到它的主人身边。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'u aradığından eminsin. Bir siber mastif, efendisini kaybetmesi durumunda protokollere göre mümkünse atandığı Yargıcı'ya dönmelidir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is little doubt in your mind that he is looking for Solomorne. If a cyber-mastiff loses its master, its protocols dictate that it must return to its Arbitrator if possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'u aradığından neredeyse eminsindir. Bir siber mastif, efendisini kaybetmesi durumunda protokollere göre mümkünse Yargıcı'sına dönmelidir.{/n}
